channel.title: Mahak Malik - DevOps Blog
channel.description: Sharing insights, experiences, and technical knowledge from my journey in DevOps, cloud infrastructure, and automation.

item.title: Why I Always Read Official Documentation (Even When AI Says "Trust Me, Bro")
item.description: Trust AI for speed — but trust the official documentation for truth. A practical note on why starting with the docs saves time and prevents weird bugs.

item.title: I Didn't Grow Up With Computers — I Grew Into DevOps
item.description: My journey into DevOps wasn't driven by childhood passion for technology. Instead, it was shaped by environment, challenges, and the people who helped me think differently about systems and problem-solving.
